ch0257_40_qibana/0101_0701_02_10:
It’s fun to go exploring together, but I want a
proper battle with you!
ch0257_40_qibana/7101_0701_01_10:
No matter how well you prepare, you never know
exactly what’ll happen in battle!
ch0257_40_qibana/7101_0701_02_10:
If something unexpected happens, you need to stay
calm enough to deal with it.
ch0257_40_qibana/7101_0701_03_10:
Use your head and feel the battle with your entire
body! That’s a must!
ch0257_40_qibana/7102_0701_01_10:
All the selfies I’ve taken until now are snapshots
of special moments in time.
ch0257_40_qibana/7102_0701_02_10:
Looking back at them brings back all of my
memories of those days in vivid detail!
ch0257_40_qibana/7102_0701_03_10:
Someday soon, I want to add a selfie of me
defeating Leon to my collection.
ch0257_40_qibana/7103_0701_01_10:
If you want to accomplish something worth
celebrating, you’ve got to keep up with your
daily training.
ch0257_40_qibana/7103_0701_02_10:
The small things you work on day to day can lead
to special moments—as long as you keep up the
hard work.
ch0257_40_qibana/7103_0701_03_10:
If you want, I could show you my personal
training routine. I came up with it myself!
ch0257_40_qibana/7104_0701_01_10: It’s hard to get a decent selfie of me with Flygon.
ch0257_40_qibana/7104_0701_02_10:
Most of the time, all I get are pictures of the
sandstorms he kicks up!
ch0257_40_qibana/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m impressed by how far you’ve come,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! But I’ll be sure to
keep getting better, too!
ch0257_40_qibana/7105_0701_02_10:
Since I’m Leon’s greatest rival, I’ve got to live up
to that title!
ch0257_40_qibana/1701_0701_01_10:
Yo! So here’s where you were hanging out.
I’ve got something for you.
ch0257_40_qibana/1701_0702_01_10:
Sometimes the simplest things can help you
overcome a tough situation.
ch0257_40_qibana/2501_0701_01_10:
I know I rock the casual look, but I clean up pretty
well in a suit, too, don’t you think?
ch0257_40_qibana/2501_0701_02_10:
I’m not just serious about Pokémon battles—I’m
also particular about fashion.
ch0257_40_qibana/2501_0701_03_10:
I think I’m looking pretty sharp, if I do say
so myself!
ch0257_40_qibana/2501_0702_01_10:
This is just my opinion, but I think a Champion
should have good style, too. It makes things fun
for the fans.
ch0257_40_qibana/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m pretty sure I’m better suited than Leon to take
care of that.
ch0257_40_qibana/2511_0701_01_10:
Sometimes, sticking to my personal brand
makes battling a challenge.
ch0257_40_qibana/2511_0701_02_10:
I’m pretty set in how I want to battle, so I can’t
just change it on a whim.
ch0257_40_qibana/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m gonna prove that I can become the strongest
sync pair here on my own terms!
ch0257_40_qibana/2511_0702_01_10: Here on Pasio, battles are a team effort.
ch0257_40_qibana/2511_0702_02_10: So watch my back and cover what I miss, OK?
ch0257_40_qibana/2511_0702_03_10:
I bet the two of us together would be unstoppable
no matter what happens in battle!
ch0257_40_qibana/3001_0701_01_10:
Some people see a sunrise and think it’s special,
but others might find it ordinary. It’s all about
perspective, I guess.
ch0257_40_qibana/3003_0701_01_10:
If you’re heading out, it’s good to be prepared.
You never know what kind of weather you’ll
run into!
ch0257_40_qibana/3005_0701_01_10:
I think a selfie with the moon in the background
would make a pretty decent shot!
